headline: A Look At Vulcan Materials (VMC) Valuation As Shares Trade Near Narrative Fair Value
summary: Vulcan Materials (VMC) is back on investors’ radar after a recent 1 day gain of 1.4%, which contrasts with a small loss over the past week and modest gains over the month and past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Vulcan Materials. At a share price of $305.97, Vulcan Materials pairs a 4.6% year to date share price return with a 14.1% total shareholder return over the past year, which suggests that momentum has cooled recently while longer term holders have still seen solid gains.
